titles.title: To prohibit the imposition of a fee for waiver of the passport requirement for citizens in the case of reported theft or destruction.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations.

bill.summary: 1/20/1993--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of State from imposing a fee for waiving a requirement that U.S. citizens carry passports to enter or depart the United States if the citizen has reported the theft or destruction of the passport to the State Department or local police.
